html.overlayDesc: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud..
html.settingsAccountTabHeaderDesc: Add new accounts or manage existing ones.
html.settingsAutoConnect: Automatically connect to the server on launch.
html.settingsGameWithoutLauncher: Launch game process detached from launcher.
html.settingsCloseAllSwitcher: If the game is not detached, closing the launcher will also close the game.
html.settingsDownloadSpeedDesc: Here's listed maximum download speed in KB/s
html.settingsMemoryDesc: The recommended minimum RAM is 3 gigabytes. Setting the minimum and maximum values to the same value may reduce lag.
html.settingsJavaPathId:
The Java executable is validated before game launch. Requires Java 8 x64.
The path should end with bin<%= process.platform === 'win32' ? '\javaw.exe' : '/java' %>.
html.settingsJVMOptsDesc:
Options to be provided to the JVM at runtime. -Xms and -Xmx should notbe included.
Available Options for Java 8.
html.settingsTabHeaderDesclauncherId: Options related to the launcher itself.
html.settingsPreReleaseTextId:
Pre-Releases include new features which may have not been fully tested or integrated.
This will always be true if you are using a pre-release version.
html.settingsInstallInfoId:
All game files and local Java installations will be stored in the data directory.
Screenshots and world saves are stored in the instance folder for the corresponding server configuration.
html.settingsTabHeaderDescAboutId: View information and release notes for the current version.
html.settingsTabHeaderDescLauncherUpdateId: Download, install, and review updates for the launcher.
html.passNotStored: Your password is sent directly to NorthernBlade server and never stored.
html.launcherNotAfillAcc: Blade Launcher is not affiliated with NorthernBlade account.

userMigrated.title:
Error During Login:
Invalid Credentials
userMigrated.desc: You've attempted to login with a migrated account. Try again using the account email as the username.

invalidCredentials.title:
Error During Login:
Invalid Credentials
invalidCredentials.desc: The email or password you've entered is incorrect. Please try again.

rateLimit.title:
Error During Login:
Too Many Attempts
rateLimit.desc: There have been too many login attempts with this account recently. Please try again later.

noInternet.title:
Error During Login:
No Internet Connection
noInternet.desc: You must be connected to the internet in order to login. Please connect and try again.

authDown.title:
Error During Login:
Authentication Server Offline
authDown.desc: Mojang's authentication server is currently offline or unreachable. Please wait a bit and try again. You can check the status of the server on Mojang's help portal.

emailNotConfirmed.title: Registration was not completed
emailNotConfirmed.desc:
Please confirm you email address first.
Visit link for more information

notPaid.title:
Error During Login:
Game Not Purchased
notPaid.desc:
The account you are trying to login with has not purchased a copy of Minecraft.
You may purchase a copy on Minecraft.net

tabAbout.settingsUpdateTitle: You Are Running the Latest Version

overlay.overlayWarningDesc:
In order to use the launcher you must be logged into at least one account. You will need to login again after.

Are you sure you want to log out?

requirements.title: Error: The required libraries were not found.
requirements.desc: For the game to work correctly, you will need to download and install the necessary libraries.
